## What is Python?

* Free, open-source programming language   
* Popular   
* Why R?  
* Free  
* Powerful, even more than proprietary expensive statistical software  
* Good graphics  
* Need to type commands instead of point-and-click \- this makes it harder, but being able to save, modify, and share code makes it reproducible

## Why use Python?

* \[insert answers here\]

## Python v. R

* Both R and Python are popular. Python is more widely used and requested by employers. We ran a Python workshop last semester.  
* Python is a general-purpose programming language that has many data analysis packages. R was built for data analysis.   
* For the purpose of data analysis, R is a bit easier to use and learn than Python. This is why Google Data Analytics Certificate teaches R instead of Python.  
* Python is faster and more powerful than R, especially for certain machine learning algorithms that require processing huge data sets.

* More hands on than a lecture

  * Plots

  * Ex. Which major made the highest avg. income?

[https://drive.google.com/file/d/1go62ppIcfPkq-eXGPZYcQEm0KFBFJwLL/view](https://drive.google.com/file/d/1go62ppIcfPkq-eXGPZYcQEm0KFBFJwLL/view) 

[Top 100 Richest People in the World Dataset \- Kaggle](https://www.kaggle.com/datasets/ayessa/top-100-richest-people-in-the-world)

- The dataset includes their rank, name, net worth, birthday, age, and nationality.

[Top 10 Netflix TV Shows and Films](https://www.kaggle.com/datasets/dhruvildave/netflix-top-10-tv-shows-and-films)

- Dataset Features:   
  - track\_name: Name of the song.  
  - artist(s)\_name: Name of the artist(s) performing the song.  
  - artist\_count: Number of artists contributing to the song.  
  - released\_year, released\_month, released\_day: Release date details.

[Most Streamed Spotify Songs](https://www.kaggle.com/datasets/abdulszz/spotify-most-streamed-songs/data) 

- Dataset Features:  
  - track\_name: Name of the song.  
  - artist(s)\_name: Name of the artist(s) performing the song.  
  - artist\_count: Number of artists contributing to the song.  
  - released\_year, released\_month, released\_day: Release date details.

[Country Life Expectancies](https://www.kaggle.com/datasets/paperxd/cleaned-life-expectancy-dataset) 

- Dataset Features:  
  - Countries with a ton of missing values have been completely removed from the dataset, and countries with a small amount of missing values have been predicted by a machine learning model.  
  - The dataset includes data for 193 countries and has been meticulously merged into a single file containing 22 columns and 2,938 rows, representing 20 predictive variables  
  - The variables were categorized into four main groups: Immunization-related factors, Mortality factors, Economic factors, and Social factors. Countries with a lot of missing values were excluded, and some values were generated by Bayesian Ridge.
